name: Some Kind of Drifter
description:
Install: Download appropriate .zip and extract, run .exe or equivalent.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys - throttle & drifting
  • R - reset your bike to the middle of the highway and slightly back from where you were (when you touch anything you will need to reset)
  • Mouselook on mouse
  • Alt F4 to exit after you're done
Files notes: Updated the UI to not be garbage at all except 1 resolution.
